Package gameplay

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Game
    Game class contains the main game loop and displays the game window.
    Keyboard
    Keyboard class handles user input.
    Level
    Level class, loads maps from a specified folder and stores the selected map in an int 2d array.
    Pause
    Pause class handles pause logic.
    Player
    Player class contains parameters related to players - position, color, direction, speed - and helper methods related to player logic
    Score
    Score class is used to store player 1 and player 2 scores.
    Tuple
    Tuple class used to store integers for color and glow of a player.
